## FileSystem.isDirectoryError() method

Returns true if the error object indicates the target is a directory (`EISDIR`<></>).

**Signature:**

```typescript
static isDirectoryError(error: Error): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | Error |  |

**Returns:**

boolean
